abstract: Heurelho da Silva Gomes (Portuguese pronunciation: [ˈɡõmiʃ]), born 15 February 1981), commonly known as Heurelho Gomes or just Gomes, is a Brazilian goalkeeper, who is currently playing for Tottenham Hotspur. He previously made a name for himself at Dutch club PSV.
